Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Jazz Site on Barrington consists of a 23,962 square foot irregular shaped parcel with direct frontage on Barrington Street. The site can accommodate approximately 95,000 square feet of buildable density steps from downtown Halifax. The size features over 220 feet of frontage on Barrington Street with excellent views over Halifax Harbour. A multifamily massing concept has been prepared for the development which is available from CBRE.Â The site is being offered unpriced and an offer date will be announced. Interested parties should sign and return the confidentiality agreement for further information.

The highway Retail Development Lands in the Brunello Community offer an excellent opportunity to acquire a position adjacent to a new Sobeys anchored plaza in a rapidly growing residential community. The lands include highway visibility at a future lighted intersection with a convenient location leaving Halifax en route to the South Shore. Lot sizes range for 1.8 acres up to 12.0 acres offering a flexibility for a variety of use. Note, certain use restrictions apply. Contact CBRE for more information.

High-profile development site near highly visible intersection. Situated moments from the links at Brunello, a world class golf course & community development. $14.00 Per square foot.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Featuring 6.73 acres of land, this property is generally level with commercial development capability and offers excellent brand exposure to Highway 101. The site is located immediately adjacent to the Super 8 by Wyndham along Cole Drive. Cole Drive is one of the few remaining streets from Windsor to Kentville which offers high profile exposure and near immediate access to Highway 101. The existing zoning permits a wide variety of commercial and industrial uses. See Flyer for more information!
